name: nbind
description: Magical headers that make your C++ library accessible from JavaScript

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && tsc -p src/em && tsc -p src && cbuild -x -v -s dist/bundle/em/em-api.js -o dist/em-api.js
scripts.test-asm: npm run config-test && cd test/em && node-gyp configure build --asmjs=1 && node ../../bin/ndts . > ../testlib.d.ts && tsc -p .. && tap ../test.js
scripts.test: npm run config-test && cd test/v8 && node-gyp configure build           && node ../../bin/ndts . > ../testlib.d.ts && tsc -p .. && tap ../test.js --gc && tap ../test-v8.js

author: Juha JÃ¤rvi
